message.body: I interviewed for the desk job at the Fabric Workshop and Museum http://www.fabricworkshopandmuseum.org and talked about your work during my interview lol wish me luck
I emailed the interviewer your website as part of my thank you follow up email haha ❤️❤️hope your work is a good luck charm for meee
Omg no I haven't! Thanks for sending lol
That's so nice!!! Thanks! Fingers crossed for you! I've never been there and have always wanted to go! Let me know when u hear back!
U coming to ny anytime soon?
